name: KneeArthroplastySurgery
title: Knee Arthroplasty Surgery
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This grouping of value sets identifies patients who have a procedure of a knee arthroplasty.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a knee arthroplasty procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent knee arthroplasty procedures.  Codes used are to be ICD10PCS, ICD9CM or SNOMED-CT codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
